statements: SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM LegalDocuments ORDER BY document_name DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_type FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_type='Contract';
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM LegalDocuments WHERE date_created > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments ORDER BY date_created ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_type='Contract';
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_type='Report' ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_type, document_name FROM LegalDocuments WHERE date_created < '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_name, LENGTH(document_content) AS content_length FROM LegalDocuments WHERE LENGTH(document_content) > 10000;
SELECT document_type, COUNT(*) AS document_count FROM LegalDocuments GROUP BY document_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY document_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM title_deeds ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT title_id, owner_name FROM permits WHERE estate_id = 100;
SELECT permit_document FROM permits WHERE issue_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT estate_id, owner_name FROM title_deeds WHERE owner_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY estate_id DESC;
SELECT title_id, owner_name, date_added FROM title_deeds WHERE owner_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY title_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM title_deeds WHERE estate_id = 1001;
SELECT owner_name, title_document FROM title_deeds WHERE date_added >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT permit_id, permit_document, estate_id FROM permits WHERE issue_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, estate_id FROM title_deeds JOIN permits ON title_deeds.estate_id = permits.estate_id;
SELECT * FROM title_deeds ORDER BY date_added DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM title_deeds;
SELECT owner_name, deed_number FROM title_deeds WHERE deed_id = 1;
SELECT permit_number, type, expiration_date FROM permits WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT deed_number, owner_name FROM title_deeds ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT permit_number, type, expiration_date FROM permits ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM title_deeds WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT permit_number, expiration_date FROM permits WHERE type = 'Building';
SELECT deed_id, owner_name FROM title_deeds ORDER BY owner_name DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, p.permit_number, td.owner_name FROM transactions t JOIN permits p ON t.permit_id = p.permit_id JOIN title_deeds td ON t.deed_id = td.deed_id WHERE t.amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM title_deeds;
SELECT id, document_name, timestamp FROM title_deeds ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT document_name, file_path FROM title_deeds WHERE document_type = 'Deed';
SELECT id, document_type, timestamp FROM title_deeds WHERE id = 3;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM title_deeds WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM title_deeds WHERE id = 1;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM permits WHERE date_issued >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, transaction_number, buyer_name FROM real_estate_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, timestamp FROM document_archive WHERE document_type = 'invoice' AND file_path LIKE '%pdf%';
SELECT * FROM permits WHERE permit_type IN ('building', 'zoning') LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT deed_id, owner_name, creation_date FROM title_deeds ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT permit_id, requester_name, expiry_date FROM permits WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT transaction_id, deed_id, permit_id FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM title_deeds WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT document, owner_name FROM title_deeds ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM permits WHERE requester_name = 'Jane Smith' AND expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT t.transaction_id, td.document, p.requester_name FROM transactions t JOIN title_deeds td ON t.deed_id = td.deed_id JOIN permits p ON t.permit_id = p.permit_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id WHERE u.email LIKE '%@example.com';
